entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
